programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the SVU detectives investigate the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, drunken students and conflicting accounts complicate matters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a concert turns into a mob scene, a teenager is brutally assaulted; Detective Amaro ends up defending the prime suspect's reputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into how a comatose woman ended up in a river near the mayor's home reveals the victim's unexpected wild side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A vigilante group forms in response to a string of rapes; concerns over his wife's fidelity distract Amaro.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The special victims squad tries to take down a sex-trafficking operation that enslaves young women; when the investigation is halted by Lt. Alexandra Eames (Kathryn Erbe), Detective Benson has to get creative.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman claims that the baby she kidnapped is hers with a respected legal expert, the investigation changes the lives of two families.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Detectives from New York's SVU come to Chicago to help take down a pedophilia ring; Platt shows her respect for the police.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When Asher is killed while Antonio is on his security duty, Voight and Olinsky make sure he is covered; Halstead and Lindsay go under cover; Kot wants an answer from Lindsay.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Following a big heroin bust, Olinsky learns that the suspects are holding his wife hostage; Burgess and Roman get an assignment that pairs them with a K-9 officer: Roman's former partner (Spencer Grammer).

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The intelligence team works to find those responsible for Burgess' wounds; a search of the house provides valuable information.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Lindsay calls on Voight and his unit for help with her first case on the federal task force; Burgess is relegated to desk duty.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek's father (Jack Coleman) is first on the scene of a double murder; Lindsay prepares for an undercover investigation in Bolivia; Roman and Burgess try to move forward.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Antonio and his sister talk to Elliot Gish about the person they think is responsible for the fire that killed Shay; Lindsay has second thoughts about the task force; Platt's new, sunny demeanor results in curiosity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide tries to prove his suspicions about the arsonist's identity; Casey gets accustomed to his new lifestyle; Dawson goes on a date with a regular from the bar.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide wants to implicate the serial arsonist; Dawson and Shay face the unexpected on a routine call; suspicions indicate Clarke is the mole; Mouch campaigns for union president.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: McLeod pushes Boden toward an early retirement and chooses a potential replacement; all make known their disdain for the mole; Shay enjoys a full social life.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide comes across a boy in need of help while out on a jog; Boden and McLeod clash over the future of the firehouse; Mouch and Greg Sullivan debate on Otis' podcast.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The firehouse crew goes to the scene of a railroad accident; Boden must make a big decision about his future; Severide learns more about the woman he saw with his father; Shay and Dawson continue to butt heads.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The shooting of a child in their neighborhood forces Cruz and his brother to think about the gang; Isabella gets Mills to dress up for a gala; Casey feels sad he will be seeing Dawson less; Shay gets in deeper with Devon.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden tries to keep the firehouse from closing; the romance between Dawson and Casey grows; Cruz worries for his brother's safety; Severide and Katie make up for lost time.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An adventurer (Nicolas Cage) must steal the Declaration of Independence and use its hidden map to find a legendary fortune.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Chief Boden leads the fight to keep the firehouse open; an emergency call to an apartment structure puts the squad in harm's way; Dawson receives life-changing news.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey returns to work after a brush with death; Shay's new partner is friendly to everyone but her; Dawson begins training; Severide prepares for his instructor duties; Clarke refuses to talk to the police about the murder.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when woman visiting from Buffalo, N.Y., claims her car was stolen with her baby in the backseat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young mail-order bride is found dead, the investigation leads the detectives to the Russian mafia.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Rollins investigate when a mental patient says he witnessed a rape, but the alleged victim denies the assault happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a child disappears on his way home from school, Benson and Amaro interview the distraught parents, who don't trust the police; with the help of their TARU tech (Gilbert Gottfried) and a meddling reporter, the detectives narrow the suspects list.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: An elaborate bank heist to steal a single safe deposit box held by a Navy contractor leads NCIS to investigate her corrupt consulting firm.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team searches for a Marine reservist with a history of post-traumatic stress disorder who disappears following a drunk and disorderly altercation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates a possible terror threat after the chief of logistics for a naval weapons station collapses on the job; Kensi and Deeks research different honeymoon locations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is beaten by her boyfriend, a famous hip-hop star, but she refuses to help ADA Barba build his case; the defendant and his attorney turn the case into a media circus.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the suspected rape of a woman Benson helped earlier leads to a cybermogul; the team bids farewell to Sgt. Munch.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Barba finds that a friend (Kirk Acevedo) -- with a connection to a mayoral candidate frontrunner -- is accused of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a suspect is gravely injured and the case becomes a public spectacle, Amaro's badge is on the line; Cragen surprises everyone with an announcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an underage runaway is found beaten and raped, the SVU team works with federal prosecutor Connie Rubirosa (Alana De La Garza); ADA Barba suspects a cover-up when he fails to get the help he needs from Jersey law enforcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro suspects the boyfriend of a missing girl is involved with a gang; Sgt. Benson becomes the SVU's new commanding officer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The already frantic search for a missing diabetic boy becomes more urgent when he is spotted with a couple known for child endangerment and pornography.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a controversial misogynistic comic is accused of rape, Benson is happy to arrest him, but Barba feels the case is weak.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins is contacted by a hometown friend when his nephew, a high school football star, goes missing in New York; Rollins seeks help with her escalating problems.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins strikes a deal with the managers of a gambling club in order to protect her job, she ends up drawing the suspicion of Benson and Tutuola.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: A page from the diary of John Wilkes Booth implicates Ben Gates' (Nicolas Cage) great-great grandfather as a major conspirator in the assassination of President Lincoln.
